title: Plan JSON Schema
description: Schema for Narratoria Plan JSON documents generated by narrator AI

requestId.description: Unique identifier for this plan execution

narrative.description: Optional narrative text to display to player

toolId.description: Unique ID for this tool within the plan

input.description: JSON object passed to tool via stdin

dependencies.description: Array of toolId values that must complete first

parallel.description: Whether tools can run concurrently (if dependencies allow)
